attacks.name: Bind Wound
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon (1 if it has only 1).

attacks.name: Dogpile
attacks.effect: Count the number for Pokémon on your Bench. This attack does 10 times that number to the Defending Pokémon, and Chansey does 10 times that number of damage to itself.
